title: Flor de Sal d'Es Trenc - Hand Harvested Mediterranean Sea Salt - Natural | Melissa Guerra
snippet: Guerra › Food › Chiles & Spices › Flor de Sal d'Es Trenc - Hand Harvested Mediterranean Sea Salt - Natural Flor de Sal d'Es Trenc - Hand Harvested Mediterranean Sea Salt - Natural Rich in flavor and slightly moist, Flor de Sal's Hand Harvested Mediterranean Natural Sea Salt is more than just ordinary table and to your cooking.  Flor de Sal Mediterranean Natural Sea Salt is harvested by hand
